content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can we help you today? Are you having an issue with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC?
Hi, I need some plumbing work done, but I'm not ready to set anything up just yet.
Sure thing! Just to confirm, is there something specific you need help with? And may I have your name so I can better assist you when you're ready?
It's a leaking pipe, but I have to wait until my insurance says they'll cover it. That's why I'm not booking yet.
I completely understand. Insurance can take some time to sort things out. Would you like us to follow up with you later, or would you prefer to reach out when your insurance gives you the go-ahead?
Thanks, I'll get in touch once I know for sure. I appreciate it!
You're very welcome! We'll be here whenever you're ready. If you have any other questions in the meantime, just let us know. Take care!
reason: Customer waiting for insurance before scheduling.
